Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoLoad.name: VPKEventVideoLoad
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoLoad.abstract: NSNotification sent when a video is loaded and ready to play

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoUnload.name: VPKEventVideoUnload
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoUnload.abstract: NSNotification sent when a video is unloaded from the video player (no longer the currentItem)

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPlayRequ.name: VPKEventVideoPlayRequested
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPlayRequ.abstract: NSNotification sent when the user first requests the video to play (for example, by pressing the play button). This notification is only sent once per video load (not resent after a video pause event).

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPlay.name: VPKEventVideoPlay
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPlay.abstract: NSNotification sent when the video currentItem rate changes from 0 to any number greater than 0.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPause.name: VPKEventVideoPause
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPause.abstract: NSNotification sent when the video currentItem rate changes from any number greater than 0 to 0

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoComplete.name: VPKEventVideoComplete
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoComplete.abstract: NSNotification sent when the video currentItem plays out to the end.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoSeekStar.name: VPKEventVideoSeekStart
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoSeekStar.abstract: NSNotification sent when a seek event is initiated on the player

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoSeekComp.name: VPKEventVideoSeekComplete
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoSeekComp.abstract: NSNotification sent when a seek event is completed on the player

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoObserved.name: VPKEventVideoObservedBitrateKey
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoObserved.abstract: The download (network) bitrate in bits per second. Negative if unknown.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPlayback.name: VPKEventVideoPlaybackBitrateKey
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoPlayback.abstract: The required bitrate for video playback in bits per second. Negative if unknown.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoFramesPe.name: VPKEventVideoFramesPerSecondKey
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoFramesPe.abstract: The video track nominalFrameRate if available: otherwise negative.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoNumberOf.name: VPKEventVideoNumberOfDroppedVideoFrames
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoNumberOf.abstract: The total number of dropped video frames. Negative if unknown.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoStartupT.name: VPKEventVideoStartupTimeKey
Constants.html#/c:@VPKEventVideoStartupT.abstract: The accumulated duration until player item is ready to play. Measured in seconds. Negative if unknown.

Constants.html#/c:@VPKIdentifierKey.name: VPKIdentifierKey
Constants.html#/c:@VPKIdentifierKey.abstract: Key to retrieve media identifier from VPKit Video NSNotification event info dictionary.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)f.name: +forwardErrorNotifications:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)f.abstract: sets the location for error dialogue handling - in the SDK or in the host app.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)l.name: +logout
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)l.abstract: Log out user from the default SDK.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)l.name: -logout
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)l.abstract: Log out user from an SDK instance.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.name: +authenticateWithEmail:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.abstract: Class-level lighweight authentication for users with email identifier but no password.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.name: +authenticateWithEmail:password:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.abstract: Class-level heavyweight authentication for users with email identifier and password.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)a.name: -authenticateWithEmail:password:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)a.abstract: Instance-level heavyweight authentication for users with email identifier and password.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.name: +getDailyStats:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.abstract: gets daily stats for the last seven days for this user

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)v.name: +viewerWithPreview:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)v.abstract: Create a VPKVeepViewer. This is the view controller for viewing image and video content with Veep metadata.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)v.name: +viewerWithImage:fromPreview:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)v.abstract: Create a VPKVeepViewer. Usse this method to provide image data with higher resolution than contained in the VPKPreview imageView.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)e.name: +editorWithImage:fromView:error:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)e.abstract: Create a VPKVeepEditor. This is the view controller for creating and editing Veep metadata for image and video content.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)p.name: +presentViewer:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)p.abstract: Presents a viewer on a new overlaying UIWindow - allows full orientation changes on the viewer while underlying controller may have more restricted orientations.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)r.name: +requestVeep:completionBlock:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)r.abstract: request a veep by veepId and return a VPKPublicVeep in the completion handler

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.name: +getVeep:completionBlock:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.abstract: Request a veep by veepId and return a VPKVeep in the completion handler.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)r.name: +requestVeepWithURL:completionBlock:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)r.abstract: Request a veep by originalContentURI and return a VPKPublicVeep in the completion handler.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.name: +getVeepWithURL:completionBlock:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.abstract: Request a veep by originalContentURI and return a VPKVeep in the completion handler.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.name: +getVeepIdWithURI:useCache:completionBlock:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.abstract: Request a veep identifier by originalContentURI and return the identifier as an NSString in the completion handler.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.name: +getVeepHeaderWithURI:useCache:completionBlock:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.abstract: Request a veep header by originalContentURI and return the header as an VPKPublicVeep in the completion handler.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)s.name: +sdkVersion
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)s.abstract: A string representation of the VPKit version.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)c.name: +copyVeep:toKit:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)c.abstract: Copy veeps from the default app to a destination app. The default app is invoked by the class method. The destination app instance is passed in as a parameter.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.name: +deleteVeep:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.abstract: Remove the most recent version of a veep from the default app.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.name: -deleteVeep:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.abstract: Remove the most recent version of a veep from an app instance.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.name: +deleteVeeps:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.abstract: Remove all versions of a veep from the default app.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.name: -deleteVeeps:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.abstract: Remove all versions of a veep from an app instance.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: margin
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: set this property to adjust the left and right margins for the Veep View.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: previewIconWidth
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: set this property to adjust the VPKPreview icon width.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: font
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: VPKit font styles are set and adjusted in this VPKFontStyles object.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: color
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: VPKit color styles are set and adjusted in this VPKColorStyles object.

Classes/VPKPublicVeep.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: originalContentWidth
Classes/VPKPublicVeep.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Width of media item at soure URI

Classes/VPKPublicVeep.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: originalContentHeight
Classes/VPKPublicVeep.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Height of media item at soure URI

Classes/VPKPublicVeep.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: previewURL
Classes/VPKPublicVeep.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: URL of preview item. This is the poster image if the media item is a video.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: readonly
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: if set to YES the veep viewer will be presented regardless of whether the user has permissions to edit veeps. Default is NO.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: veepId
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Read-only veepId - obtained from the VPKImage if initalised with a veepId, or from the imageURL if there is a matching veep available.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: delegate
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: The optional touch delegate affords the host app full control over the invoking of Veep Viewer and Veep Editors. If not set, VPKPreview will handle the presenting and dismissing of Viewers and Editors. If set, the host app is responsible for VeepViewer and VeepEditor management using the touch delegate callback.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: passThroughDelegate
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: The optional pass-through delegate sends tap gesture recogniser messages to the receiver. in the event that the VPKPreview doesn’t handle it’s tap. This is useful where the VPKPreview is view-only and the image has no associated veep content. and the host app wishes to respond to taps that the VPKPreview will ignore.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: tapGR
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Readonly UITapGesetureRecognizer - set cancelsTouchesInView to NO to continue to receive didSelect: messages in collection view cells.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: invokeViewerForAllImages
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: if YES touching a VPKPreview will invoke the VPKit image viewer for all images. If NO, viewer will be invoked only for Veep’d images. Default is NO.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: animateTouch
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: if YES the preview will animate when touched for better touch feedback.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: iconLength
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: adjusts the size of the icon. Default is 50.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: useCache
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: use short-term caching for VeepIds. Default is YES;

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: autoplay
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: autoplay. Default is NO;

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -showIcon
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Shows the veep content icon.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -hideIcon
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Hides the veep content icon.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -showIcon:
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Shows the veep content icon, optionally animated.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -hideIcon:
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Hides the veep content icon, optionally animated.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -reset
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Reset the preview: sets the image, imageurl and corresponding veep metadata to nil.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -dismiss:
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Dismisses the veepviewer or veepeditor view controller, if it is currently presented.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -currentPlaybackTime
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: returns playback time if a video is currently playing in the VPKit SDK.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -duration
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: returns video duration if a video is currently loaded in the VPKit SDK.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -qualityOfServiceDict
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: returns NSDictionary of Quality of Service data for currently playing video. Returns nil if video not loaded.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -sessionIdentifier
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: returns a sessionId.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: -mediaIdentifier
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: returns a mediaIdentifier.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: +previewURLforYoutubeId:
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Utility method for preview of youtube veep (experimental).

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: alternativeURIs
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: An array of alternative identifiers, if available

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: veep
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: The veep metadata associated with the image, if available

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: publicVeep
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: An abbreviated, header-only version of a veep, if available.

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: mediaIdentifier
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: A courtesy property that the host app can use for tracking purposes.

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: -initWithImage:veepId:
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: Use initWithImage:veepId if you are identifying veep content using the unique identifier (id) of the veep.

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: -initWithImage:url:
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: Use initWithImage:url if you are identifying veep content using the original URI used to create the veep.

Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.name: -updateWithPublicVeep:
Classes/VPKImage.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKImag.abstract: sets the publicVeep (a veep header stub), veepId and originalContentUri.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: vpkGreen
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: VEEPIO green. Default color for veep track rectangles.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: navBar
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: Color to use for the main navigation bar.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: navBarText
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: Color to use for the main navigation bar text.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: navBarLight
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: Light color to use for the main navigation bar.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: navBarDark
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: Dark color to use for the main navigation bar.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: cellNavBar
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: Color to use for the cell navigation bar.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.name: cellMidGrey
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)V.abstract: Gray color to use for the cell navigation bar.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html.name: VPKColorStyles
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html.abstract: VPKit color styles are set and adjusted here.

Classes/VPKFontStyles.html.name: VPKFontStyles
Classes/VPKFontStyles.html.abstract: VPKit font styles are set and adjusted here.

Classes/VPKStyles.html.name: VPKStyles
Classes/VPKStyles.html.abstract: Use VPKStyles and it’s subclasses to alter the default appearance of the VPKit UI.

Classes/VPKit.html.name: VPKit
Classes/VPKit.html.abstract: Public entry point for the VPKit framework

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
